laboratory_examinations.findings: A novel heterozygous mutation in exon 1 of the EXT1 gene (c.848T>A), resulting in a stop codon (p.L283X) was identified.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Polymerase chain reaction (PCR) for EXT1 and EXT2 genes
laboratory_examinations.findings: No changes were found in EXT2; heterozygous variants found in EXT1 at c.848T>A and c.1035C>T.
